t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create an account. 2. Delete it. 3. Modify the deleted account.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify an account with leading spaces in id.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create an account 2. Modify that account with leading spaces in id.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify an account with trailing spaces in id.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create an account 2. Modify that account with trailing spaces in id.

t:test_case.t:objective: Verify that the change in zimbraMailHost is refelcted in zimbraMailTransport attribute.
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Create an account with zimbraMailHost as multihostA.FQDN 2. Modify that account with zimbraMailHost as multihostB.FQDN.

t:test_case.t:objective: Modify an account and set zimbraFeatureViewInHtmlEnabled to TRUE/FALSE
Admin Modifies the Account Status of a normal user account
Admin Modifies the Account Status of a Admin account
Admin Modifies the Account Status of a Domain Admin account
Domain Admin Modifies the Account Status of a normal account
Domain Admin Modifies the Account Status of a Domain Admin account
